name: Queen of the Sea
description:
For this game jam, I was inspired by the story of Anne Bonny, a fearless pirate who defied societal norms to become a legend. I couldn't believe how incredible  her life was, and I wanted more people to know about her and her adventures!

I used Unity and the Adventure Creator toolkit, which was fun to learn. The paper silhouette style was chosen to give the game a bit of a storybook feel.

For further reading:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anne_Bonny

http://www.history.com/news/history-lists/5-notorious-female-pirates

http://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/if-theres-a-man-among-ye-the-tale-of-pirat...
